body_html: git_repository is evil and jgit is buggy, so maybe that's just a weird flake. Also I'm not sure if we officially maintain this branch anymore, so the way I see it, this PR makes it less obviously broken than before.

body: `git_repository` is evil and jgit is buggy, so maybe that's just a weird flake. Also I'm not sure if we officially maintain this branch anymore, so the way I see it, this PR makes it less obviously broken than before.
